name: Gifts for Coffee Lovers
tagline: A curated selection of coffee gifts for every type of coffee lover.
description: Whether they like to brew, sip or snack, these gifts are sure to delight any coffee enthusiast.

gifts.name: Vacuum coffee storage
gifts.description: It may look like a speaker but this item is the addition all coffee lovers need. Keep those coffee beans and grounds guarded from the pesky air for a fresh brew every time!

image.alt_text: Image of Vacuum coffee storage. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Roasted Coffee Soy Candle
gifts.description: Think outside the coffee mug and get them this hand-poured, coffee-scented soy candle. It keeps those coffee smells going long after the cup has been drained. UK based. Smells amazing.

image.alt_text: Image of Roasted Coffee Soy Candle. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Aeropress Go coffee press kit
gifts.description: The aeropress but redesigned for travel. Errrm yes. To be honest we always thought the original was great for travel so imagine how good this updated version is. A coffee and travel lover special.

image.alt_text: Image of Aeropress Go coffee press kit. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Opus conical burr grinder
gifts.description: Easily elevate your coffee brewing technique with this high-precision, highly stylish coffee grinder from Fellow. Looks good, smells good, works good.

image.alt_text: Image of Opus conical burr grinder. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: HyperChiller
gifts.description: Cools a coffee in seconds... So you'll be sorted the few days a year its hot enough in the UK to want an iced coffee.

image.alt_text: Image of HyperChiller. A great gift to give someone special.
